Key:
Choose the Yamai Sisters, Shido. If you do,
then the ice river of the Netherworld will
welcome you.

Analysis. Kaguya is saying that if you come
with us, she'll buy you juice.
God... I need to get out of here.
Grr, Shido... It is cowardly of you to escape.
I mean, this situation is too much.

(I ran around trying to get rid of them before
returning to school.)

(Hm? The person walking from the other side
is...?)
(It looks like it's my friend... Tonomachi!)
Tonomachi, my best friend! You're all I have!
...Can you not be so close to me?

Th-That's so messed up! You're the one who
started it!
Anyways, this isn't the time to be doing this.
I don't get it... Did you need something?
They're here! Let's run for it, Tonomachi!

Warning. We will run after you, even if it's to
the ends of hell!

Shut up and run, Tonomachi. If they catch
you—You'll die.

(And that's how we ran through the city.
I was grateful to have added an accomplice to
my party. He was my emotional pillar.)

(I... will never forget him. In the end, I used
him as my shield and ran for it. Rest in peace,
Tonomachi.)
